TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Project extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class has been deprecated. Please use Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project from the Microsoft.Build assembly instead.")

summary.span: Represents a project that can be built using MSBuild.

span.span: Represents a project that can be built using MSBuild.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个表示[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]项目。A represents an [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project. 它是项、 属性和目标的容器。It is a container for items, properties and targets. 它从内存中 XML 或 XML 文件，可以加载项目内容，并可以将保存到 XML 文件中，保留大多数空格和所有 XML 注释。It can load project content from in-memory XML or from an XML file, and can save to an XML file, preserving most whitespace and all XML comments. 每个必须与关联访问共享的信息。Every must be associated with an to access shared information. 在生成过程跟踪当前生成的项目的对象。During a build, the object keeps track of which projects are currently building.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，并使用， ，和类，以列出所有的项和项目中的属性。The following example creates a object and uses the , , and classes to list all the items and properties in the project. [!code-csharp[msbuild_ListItemsAndProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_ListItemsAndProperties/CS/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[msbuild_ListItemsAndProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_ListItemsAndProperties/VB/Module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultToolsVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DefaultToolsVersion : string with get, set

summary.span: Sets or gets the ToolsVersion XML attribute found on the [Project Element (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653) element in the project file.

span.span: Sets or gets the ToolsVersion XML attribute found on the [Project Element (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653) element in the project file.

value.span: 一个表示工具版本字符串。

span.span: A string representing the Tools version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性上不存在[Project 元素 (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653)元素，获取的值返回父级的默认工具版本。If the attribute is not present on the [Project Element (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653) element, getting the value returns the default Tools version of the parent . 值可能不同于其值覆盖构造期间在生成期间使用的工具版本实例或其设置为特定值与属性。The value can differ from the Tools version used during a build if its value is overridden during construction of the instance or it is set to a specific value with the property. 设置值不能更改的工具版本，如果它已被重写，但您可以更改工具的版本使用属性。Setting the value cannot change the Tools version if it has been overridden, but you can change the Tools version using the property. 有关工具版本的详细信息，请参阅`MSBuild Tool Set (ToolsVersion)`。For more information about Tools versions, see `MSBuild Tool Set (ToolsVersion)`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EvaluatedItems As BuildItemGroup

summary.span: Gets a collection of the items evaluated during the build.

span.span: Gets a collection of the items evaluated during the build.

value.span: 一个包含在生成过程中计算的项。

span.span: A containing the items evaluated during the build.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回后通配符和属性扩展包含在项目中的所有计算的项。The returned contains all the evaluated items in the project after wildcard and property expansion. 此属性中的项表示在生成过程中使用的实际项。The items in this property represent the actual items used during the build process. 每次在项目中的某些内容更改时生成此属性的值。This property value is generated every time something in the project changes. 将下一次保存项目，但添加或删除项不会影响项目反映对此集合中的现有项的更改。Changes to existing items in this collection will be reflected the next time the project is saved, but adding or deleting items will not impact the project.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EvaluatedItemsIgnoringCondition As BuildItemGroup

summary.span: Gets a collection of all items in a project, even those not used in the build process because a [Condition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9d7aa308-b667-48ed-b4c9-a61e49eb0a85) attribute evaluated to .

span.span: Gets a collection of all items in a project, even those not used in the build process because a [Condition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9d7aa308-b667-48ed-b4c9-a61e49eb0a85) attribute evaluated to .

value.span: 包含项目中所有项的 。

span.span: A containing all items in a project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回包含项目中的所有项后通配符和属性扩展，包括在生成过程中由于未使用的那些`Condition`特性的计算结果为`false`。The returned contains all items in the project after wildcard and property expansion, including those that were not used during the build process due to `Condition` attributes evaluating to `false`. 出现某些变化，如新元素添加到项目时，才会生成此属性的值。This property value is only generated when certain changes occur, such as a new element being added to the project. 添加或删除此属性中的项目不会影响该项目。Adding or deleting items from this property does not impact the project.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EvaluatedProperties As BuildPropertyGroup

summary.span: Gets a collection of the properties evaluated during the build.

span.span: Gets a collection of the properties evaluated during the build.

value.span: 一个包含在生成过程中计算的属性。

span.span: A containing the properties evaluated during the build.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回后执行条件求值和属性扩展包含在项目中的所有计算的属性。The returned contains all the evaluated properties in the project after performing condition evaluation and property expansion. 在此集合中的属性包括全局属性、 环境变量，保留的属性和导入的属性。The properties in this collection include global properties, environment variables, reserved properties, and imported properties. 对此集合中的现有属性的更改将反映出来的下一次保存该项目时，但添加或删除属性不影响项目。Changes to existing properties in this collection will be reflected the next time the project is saved, but adding or deleting properties will not impact the project. > [!NOTE] > 克隆对性能产生负面影响。Cloning a can negatively impact performance. 是绝对必要时，只能使用此属性的副本。Only use a copy of this property when it is strictly necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::BuildEngine::BuildPropertyGroup ^ GlobalProperties { Microsoft::Build::BuildEngine::BuildPropertyGroup ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::BuildEngine::BuildPropertyGroup ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a collection of the global properties for the project.

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of the global properties for the project.

value.span: 一个包含项目的全局属性。

span.span: A containing the global properties for the project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 全局属性是与 **/property**属性设置由集成的开发环境，才能调用的命令行上切换[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]。Global properties are properties set with the **/property** switch on the command line, or properties set by the integrated development environment before invoking [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅[MSBuild 命令行参考](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/edaa65ec-ab8a-42a1-84cb-d76d5b2f4584)。For more information, see [MSBuild Command-Line Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/edaa65ec-ab8a-42a1-84cb-d76d5b2f4584).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasToolsVersionAttribute As Boolean
public: property bool HasToolsVersionAttribute { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets whether the Project file has the ToolsVersion XML attribute.

span.span: Gets whether the Project file has the ToolsVersion XML attribute.

value.span: 如果项目具有 ToolsVersion 特性;否则为。

span.span: if the project has the ToolsVersion attribute; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 示例 ToolsVersion 特性是`Project ToolsVersion="3.5"`。An example ToolsVersion attribute is `Project ToolsVersion="3.5"`. 此特性使项目以面向.NET Framework 版本、 当前 2.0、 3.0 和 3.5。This attribute enables projects to target .NET Framework versions, currently 2.0, 3.0, and 3.5. 有关 ToolsVersion 的详细信息，请参阅[构建的特定版本的.NET Framework](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8)。For more information about ToolsVersion, see [Building for Specific Versions of the .NET Framework](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用从集成的开发环境 (IDE) 若要在项目级别设置特定属性。 is called from the integrated development environment (IDE) to set a particular property at the project level. 此方法搜索具有此名称的属性的现有属性组。This method searches the existing property groups for a property with this name. 如果找到，则更改其值。If one is found, it changes its value. 否则为它将新属性添加到该属性组，或向项目添加新的属性组。Otherwise, it either adds a new property to that property group, or adds a new property group to the project. 使用`condition`参数，以确定的属性组的名称将其置于。 uses the `condition` parameter to determine the name of the property group place it in.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ToolsVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ ToolsVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Sets or gets the current version of the Toolset being used by the project.

span.span: Sets or gets the current version of the Toolset being used by the project.

value.span: 一个表示工具集的版本号字符串。

span.span: A string representing the version number of the Toolset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工具集版本重写时，此值将成为有效的工具集版本。If the Toolset version is overridden, that value becomes the effective Toolset version. 如果项目元素的 ToolsVersion 特性，然后，就是有效的工具集版本。If there is a ToolsVersion attribute on the Project element, then that is the effective Toolset version. 否则，工具集版本为父引擎的默认工具集版本相同。Otherwise, the Toolset version is the same as the default Toolset version of the parent engine. 设置时，重写具有提供的值的项目的当前工具集版本。When set, overrides the current Toolset version of the project with the provided value. 有关工具集的更多信息，请参阅[标准和自定义工具集配置](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15a048c8-5ad3-448e-b6e9-e3c5d7147ed2)。For more information about Toolsets, see [Standard and Custom Toolset Configurations](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15a048c8-5ad3-448e-b6e9-e3c5d7147ed2). > [!NOTE] > 若要获取或设置 ToolsVersion 特性元素中使用属性。To get or set the ToolsVersion attribute on the element, use the property.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，并使用方法将内容添加到项目。The following example creates a object and uses the method to add content to the project. ， ，和类用于添加、 删除和更改项目中的项。The , , and classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
